headline: VeriSign, Inc. (VRSN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on VeriSign, Inc. on r/TradingViewSignals by Ubersicka. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VRSN. VeriSign, Inc.’s share was trading at $211.49 as of February 23rd. VRSN’s trailing and forward P/E were 32.87 and 28.01 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. VeriSign, Inc.
